scripts.text:
MERGE
    INTO [mtg].[inventory] live
    USING [mtgStg].[inventory] stg
    ON live.[Name] = stg.[Name]
		AND live.[EditionCode] = stg.[EditionCode]
		AND (live.[Foil] = stg.[Foil] OR (live.[Foil] IS NULL AND stg.[Foil] IS NULL))
		AND live.[Condition] = stg.[Condition]
    WHEN MATCHED 
		AND live.[Count] <> stg.[Count]
        THEN UPDATE SET
			live.[Name] = stg.[Name],
			live.[Count] = stg.[Count],
			live.[Edition] = stg.[Edition],
			live.[EditionCode] = stg.[EditionCode],
			live.[Condition] = stg.[Condition],
			live.[Language] = stg.[Language],
			live.[Foil] = stg.[Foil],
			live.[Type] = stg.[Type],
			live.[Cost] = stg.[Cost],
			live.[ColourIdentity] = stg.[ColourIdentity],
			live.[Rarity] = stg.[Rarity],
			live.[Price] = stg.[Price],
			live.[OverallPrice] = stg.[OverallPrice],
			live.[LastUpdated] = SYSDATETIMEOFFSET()
    WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET
        THEN INSERT (Name, Count, Edition, EditionCode, Condition, Language, Foil, Type, Cost, ColourIdentity, Rarity, Price, OverallPrice, LastUpdated)
		VALUES (stg.Name, stg.Count, stg.Edition, stg.EditionCode, stg.Condition, stg.Language, stg.Foil, stg.Type, stg.Cost, stg.ColourIdentity, stg.Rarity, stg.Price, stg.OverallPrice, SYSDATETIMEOFFSET())
	;
